mapper.sql: call_log_info_id, follow_plan_id, section_id, autio_up_id, follow_plan_name, section_name, call_type, call_creater_id, call_creater_name, customer_id, customer_name, call_creater_number, customer_number, remark, create_time, createor_id, is_delete,call_uuid,call_start_time,call_end_time,holding_time
mapper.select: select c.autio_up_id, c.call_creater_name, c.call_creater_number, c.call_log_info_id, c.customer_id, c.customer_name, c.follow_plan_name, c.customer_number, c.follow_plan_id, c.holding_time, c.section_id, c.section_name, c.remark, a.duration as duration, a.format as format, c.holding_time, a.path as path, DATE_FORMAT(c.call_start_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as callStartTimeString, DATE_FORMAT(c.call_end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as callEndTimeString from leanin_call_log_info c LEFT JOIN leanin_audio_up a on a.call_uuid = c.call_uuid where c.is_delete = "N" and c.call_log_info_id = #{callLogInfoId}
